name: The World's Hardest Game 3D Nostalgia
description:
Easy to play, very hard to finish. Can you beat The World's Hardest Game 3D Nostalgia?

The World's Hardest Game, which you used to play on flash game sites, is now with you in 3D. The same 30 levels in the original game, waiting for you in 3D!


  • Same levels as in the original game
  • Smooth gameplay
  • Cute graphics and colorful atmosphere
  • Long playing time and challenging levels
  • Auto save system
  • NOSTALGIA !!



You can use a bird's eye view to analyze the level you are in. But remember, you cannot move while in bird's eye view.
